mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.channel_id as channelId, a.config_key as configKey, a.config_code as configCode, a.config_value1 as configValue1, a.config_value2 as configValue2, a.config_value3 as configValue3, a.comment, a.created, a.creater, a.modified, a.modifier, a.status, a.config_type as configType FROM voyageone_cms2.cms_mt_channel_config a WHERE a.channel_id = #{channelId} AND a.config_key = #{configKey}
